description:
As Kondo and gang run around Kokujo Island waiting for help to arrive, the Shinsengumi and Joi Rebel joint operation is joined by an unexpected third party!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Arc de l`adieu au Shinsengumi 4: Évasion
Farewell Shinsengumi Arc Part Four: Prison Break
Saraba Shinsengumi Hen Yon: Datsugoku / Essay Manga wa Sakugaraku
さらば真選組篇四 脱獄 / エッセイ漫画は作画楽
